phase.text: Hey... what are you doing all the way in here? I need your help fixing the generator in the other room!
The great big, massive, gigantic generator in the room to the left...?
phase.textOnReturn: Hey, come on now! Help me fix my generator - the rewards will be amazing!

phase.text: Excellent! You fixed the generator! Thank you, thank you! Now we need to switch it on!
Great job with the generator! Now I need some help assembling THING! Press that green button to dispense some body parts!
phase.textOnReturn: Press the green arrow button over there to dispense some body parts!

phase.text: Drag the correct body part into the THINGOGRAM. That's THING and HOLOGRAM combined, patent pending!
phase.textOnReturn: Drag the correct pieces of THING into the hologram!

phase.text: Fantastic! Now we'll just need a huge jolt of electricity to bring him to life!

userResponse.option: Good thing we got the generator working!
And let me guess.. you need MY help again?

phase.text: The generator wont be powerful enough for this job. We need something with a bit more kick. Got any ideas?
phase.textOnReturn: We need something with a bit more kick. Got any other ideas?

userResponse.option: How about lightning? It's storming outside!
Let's go fishing for an electric eel!

phase.text: Great! I'll teleport THING to the roof right away. Hurry now! Uh, the door is... oh yes, it's up on that ledge at the back!

userResponse.option: Wait, you want me to go on the roof during a storm?

phase.text: Of course I do, I didn't hire you to just stand around!

userResponse.option: You didn't hire me at all!

phase.text: I need your help on the roof. Dont be scared, its just a little thunder and lightning and... yes, anyway, EXCELSIOR!

userResponse.option: It better not be raining up there.

phase.text: Looking for my lab notes? I think I left them in the room on the left...
Have you seen the sky from the roof tonight? It looks INCREDIBLE!
Our job is complete! Let's enjoy the night sky from the terrace!
Sounds fun... but probably not powerful enough. Try again!
